reviewText:
This presentation is so unique-one of a kind. Life changing, soul changing pottery and beautiful music drama.
Jesus Christ is at the helm of their ship!
You will never forget this couple and their love for their savior!
The best of the best!

This is a video of Michael and Pams earlier message, but it is very impacting video, making you draw conclusions about your life. It portrays Michaels wonderful sense of humour, his passion for the Word and also Pams beautiful voice and creativity.  So glad I could get a copy.  Their second message on dvd is also great.
